Everyday Concepts
About Sketches

Everyday Concepts are an ongoing effort to unpack and explore useful concepts, ideas, and mental models that crop up (or ought to) in our lives.

I am currently developing a book projects of these concepts that further explore how to visualize them and their relevance to everyday life.

Defined, sketched, and produced by Gabriel Krieshok.

Buy me a coffee ☕️ to help support this project.
